steps.name: Start
steps.description: Indicator reputation is set as 'TBD' by 'Create and Link Indicator' utility playbook. We can ignore those indicators when triggering this PB

routes.name: Compute Private IP Summary -> Copy  of Set No Reputation
Is IP Private -> Find Hostname for Internal IP
routes.label: Private IP

routes.name: Is Dedicated Tenant Record -> Is Referenced Playbook
routes.label: No, Enrich Here

routes.name: Compute VT Summary -> Compute VT Whois
Is Referenced Playbook -> Match IP in Internal Subnets
routes.label: Yes

routes.name: Compute IP Stack Summary -> Is Malicious
Get Reputation from Anomali -> Compute Anomali Summary
Is Referenced Playbook -> Update Enrichment Status to In Process
routes.label: No

routes.name: Whois Information from VT -> Copy of Whois Information from VT
Update Enrichment Status to In Process -> Match IP in Internal Subnets
Configuration -> Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX
Get Reputation from MxToolbox -> Compute MxToolbox Summary
Get Reputation from VT -> Get Whois Information
Compute AV OTX Summary -> Is Malicious
Set No Reputation for Private IP -> Enrichment Summary
Get Whois Information -> Whois Information from VT
Find Hostname for Internal IP -> Compute Private IP Summary
Copy of Whois Information from VT -> Compute VT Summary
Get Reputation from AlienVault OTX -> Compute AV OTX Summary
